divs: Sighting Detailsi had just arrived home an i walked down the driveway to check the mail it was between 4:45 an 5:00 pm eastern time. walking back up my driveway i peered up the end of my street cuz there was a storm brewing an it looked crazy because thethe shorm was low an bove it the sun was shning an the clouds were bunching up just above the tree line an there where some small clouds that looked like a mist they were small and thin wen they moved i noticed this small silver metallic looking ball just like a dot in the sky it was still cuz the clouds where moving past it an what gave it away was the way the angle of the sun reflected off of it it looked like it was invisible wen the light hit the object it showed its appearance now i stood there and stared at this thing fer a good 4 minutes before i had to run all the way upstairs into my room to get my camera an ran as fast as i could back outside an managed to capture 3-5 seconds of footage before this object started to dance around the sky an out of nowhere this larger what appear to be a silverish almost invisible (it looked kinda like if u had a clear lavalamp with silver metallic effect in the shape of a sphere streak across the sky and disappeared behind a cloud it appeard like it went into onota lake witch is just up the street form where i filmed this from my fathers driveway just as i was trying to focus the camera and get steady. upon review of the footage i noticed that wen slowed down that you can see it many times and you can see how it maneuvers in differnt directions i will attach the video i took that day this is the original footage it is mp4 format shot on a sony webbie hd camerathis footage was uploaded on july 9th 2010 but it was filmed a day the week before i cant remember. also want to report 7-8 dark orange spheres on dec 24 2010 over pittsfield airport seen these objects for about a minute while driving home an then watched them for about 30 seconds from my front yard unfortunately my camera doesn't record at night but they slowly drifted to the east from the south west part of the city before the orange glow they had each started fading one by one now i know that other people seen this because it was directly in front of bosquet ski area and they were in the sky just above and in front of the slopes. and on several occasions i have seen these red orang lights streak across the sky usually u just barely catch em out the corner of your eye cuz of thier speed. i would like to share this footage but i dont want all kinds of people in the community to think im a crazy but i will answer any questions you have
